thread.title: BRIEF-China Transinfo Technology To Halt Share Trade Pending Regulatory Review Of Asset Acquisition Proposal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Transinfo Technology To Halt Share Trade Pending Regulatory Review Of Asset Acquisition Proposal

organizations.name: shenzhen stock exchange * says china transinfo technology co ltd
transinfo technology to halt share trade pending regulatory review of asset acquisition proposal feb

text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Stock Exchange
* Says China Transinfo Technology Co Ltd TO HALT SHARE TRADE FROM FEB 2 PENDING REGULATORY REVIEW OF ASSET ACQUISITION PROPOSAL Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DUU4oT Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
